{{Description|Branch Master [[Cyrus]] of the Mondstadt [[Adventurers' Guild]] has prepared plenty of training challenges to help hone the minds and bodies of rookie adventurers. Nevertheless, he is not sure how hard these challenges are exactly, or whether those new recruits can actually pass. So, he has entrusted you with the work of testing these trials...}}
'''Adventurer's Trials''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 3.2]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2022/11/04 10:00 - 2022/11/21 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above

===Summary===
* During the event, help the [[Adventurers' Guild]] to test out the training challenges that are prepared for rookie adventurers! Complete designated challenges to obtain rewards such as [[Primogem]]s, [[Talent Level-Up Material]]s, and [[Weapon Ascension Material]]s.

==Trials==
===Sequential Trial: I===
====Challenge 1: Superfast Hat Trick====
[[File:Adventurer's Trials Sequential Trial I Superfast Hat Trick.png|200px|thumb|right]]
{{Description|Knock the Slimes into the {{color|help|Vine Goals}} by triggering the Overloaded reaction with Yanfei's and Klee's attacks to score points.<br />During the challenge, all party members cannot use their Elemental Bursts.}}
;Challenge Rules
# During the challenge, knock an Electro Slime into any of the {{color|help|Vine Goals}} to score 1 point. Knock a Large Electro Slime into a goal to score 5 points. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.
# During the challenge, the Electro Slimes and the Large Electro Slimes will not attack nor die and will continuously affect themselves with Electro.
# During the challenge, there are moving walls that Electro Slimes and Large Electro Slimes can bounce off of.

;Trial Characters
{{Card|Klee}}{{Card|Yanfei}}

====Challenge 2: Smash 'n' Bash====
[[File:Adventurer's Trials Sequential Trial I Smash 'n' Bash.png|200px|thumb|right]]
{{Description|Use Razor's attacks to break the {{color|help|Explosive Rocks}} to score points.<br />During the challenge, all party members will constantly recover Elemental Energy.}}
;Challenge Rules
# Attack the {{color|help|Explosive Rocks}} to smash them and score points. You score 1 point for smashing normal Explosive Rocks, and 3 points for smashing Explosive Rocks with special effects. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.
# Destroying Transverse Explosive Rocks will also blow up a whole row of rocks.
# Destroying Big Explosive Rocks will also destroy all the rocks on the field.
# Destroying Mighty Rocks will give all party members an increased ability to smash Explosive Rocks and restore their Stamina for a short duration.

;Trial Character
{{Card|Razor}}

====Challenge 3: Shieldbreaker====
[[File:Adventurer's Trials Sequential Trial I Shieldbreaker.png|200px|thumb|right]]
{{Description|Use Kazuha's Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst to break the enemies' shields and directly defeat the enemies.<br />During the challenge, all party members will receive a cooldown reduction and will constantly regenerate HP.}}
;Challenge Rules
# The challenge will be deemed successful when the target number of enemies are defeated.
# During the challenge, the enemies {{color|help|will immediately be defeated when their shields are broken}}.

;Trial Character
{{Card|Kaedehara Kazuha}}

===Sequential Trial: II===
====Challenge 1: Boulder Run====
[[File:Adventurer's Trials Sequential Trial II Boulder Run.png|200px|thumb|right]]
{{Description|Use Yelan's Elemental Skill to move quickly and dodge {{Color|help|Giant Pinballs}}. Pick Adventure Coins up to score points.<br />During the challenge, all party members will receive a cooldown reduction.}}
;Challenge Rules
# Gain 1 point when collecting an {{Color|help|Adventure Coin}} during the challenge. Gain 5 points when collecting a {{Color|help|Large Adventure Coin}}. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.
# The challenge will contain fast-moving {{Color|help|Giant Pinballs}} that, when touched, will send the character(s) flying.

;Trial Character
{{Card|Yelan}}

====Challenge 2: Verdant Tsunami====
[[File:Adventurer's Trials Sequential Trial II Verdant Tsunami.png|200px|thumb|right]]
{{Description|Use Sayu's Elemental Skill to freeze the water's surface and move quickly. Pick Adventure Coins up to score points.<br />During the challenge, all party members will receive a cooldown reduction and the duration of being affected by Hydro will be decreased.}}
;Challenge Rules
# Gain 1 point when collecting an {{Color|help|Adventure Coin}} during the challenge. Gain 5 points when collecting a {{Color|help|Large Adventure Coin}}. The challenge will be deemed successful when the target score is reached.
# During the challenge, the Large Cryo Slimes will neither attack nor die and will continue to affect themselves with Cryo.

;Trial Character
{{Card|Sayu}}

====Challenge 3: Thunderlit Battlefield====
[[File:Adventurer's Trials Sequential Trial II Thunderlit Battlefield.png|200px|thumb|right]]
{{Description|Use Nahida's and Keqing's Normal Attacks to trigger {{Color|help|Quicken, Aggravate, or Spread}} reactions in a short period of time to summon Thunderbolts that will defeat the enemies. When the number of reactions triggered increases, the Thunderbolts may become Super Thunderbolts, increasing their DMG and AoE.<br />During the challenge, all party members will continue to regenerate HP.}}
;Challenge Rules
# The challenge will be deemed successful when the target number of enemies are defeated.
# The Physical and all Elemental RES of enemies in challenges have been increased.
# When the {{Color|help|Quicken, Aggravate, or Spread}} reactions are triggered on opponents continuously in a short period of time, Thunderbolts will fall, dealing Electro DMG to enemies. As the number of reactions triggered increases, the Thunderbolts may become Super Thunderbolts, increasing the Electro DMG they deal and their AoE.
#* {{Environmental Damage|30|Thunderbolts}}
#* {{Environmental Damage|80|Super Thunderbolts}}

;Trial Characters
{{Card|Nahida}}{{Card|Keqing}}
